Package model

Class User

java.lang.Object
model.User
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class User extends Object implements Serializable
The User class represents a user in the photo management system, storing albums and related functionality. It implements the Serializable interface for object serialization. Each user has a name and a HashMap of albums. The class provides methods for retrieving information about the user, such as their name, albums, and specific album references. Methods for adding, deleting, and updating albums, as well as searching for photos within albums, are also available. Users are initially created with a default "stock" album containing predefined photos.
See Also:
